title: Ryans Daughter [Pal] [Disc1 - Movie 1st Half]
description:
[[More at DVDQuorum]]


RYAN\&#039;S DAUGHTER (Special Edition) - DISC 1 (1st Half)

MOVIE INFO

-Original Title: Ryan\&#039;s Daughter
-Year: 1970
-Directed by: David Lean
-Cast: Robert Mitchum, Trevor Howard, Christopher Jones, John Mills, Leo McKern, Sarah Miles, Barry Foster 
-Runtime: 187 min.
-Genre: Drama/Romance
-Plot Outline: World War I seems far away from Ireland\&#039;s Dingle peninsula when Rosy Ryan Shaughnessy goes horseback riding on the beach with the young English officer. There was a magnetic attraction between them the day he was the only customer in her father\&#039;s pub and Rosy was tending bar for the first time since her marriage to the village schoolmaster. Then one stormy night some Irish revolutionaries expecting a shipment of guns arrive at Ryan\&#039;s pub. Is it Rosy who betrays them to the British? Will Shaugnessy take Father Collin\&#039;s advice? Is the pivotal role that of the village idiot who is mute?  (Written by Dale O\&#039;Connor)

DVD INFO: 

-SYSTEM: PAL
-ASPECT RATIO: 2.20:1 16/9
-AUDIO: English, Spanish (DD 5.1)
-SUBTITLES:  English, Spanish, Danish, Finnish, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hungarian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Swedish, Croatian, Czech, Serbian, Slovenian, Turkish, English for the Hearing impaired, German for the Hearing impaired.
-INFO EXTRA: With Interactive Menu, Scene Selection. All extras and warnings removed.

The movie is in two discs DVD5. This is DISC 1 (1st Half of the movie). 

DISC 2 in a week or less.
